00040 void b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::updateAabbWorldSpace()
00041 {
00042 
00043         for (int i=0;i<this->getNumBodies();i++)
00044         {
00045                 b3RigidBodyData* body = &m_data->m_rigidBodies[i];
00046                 b3Float4 position = body->m_pos;
00047                 b3Quat  orientation = body->m_quat;
00048 
00049                 int collidableIndex = body->m_collidableIdx;
00050                 b3Collidable& collidable = m_data->m_np->getCollidableCpu(collidableIndex);
00051                 int shapeIndex = collidable.m_shapeIndex;
00052                 
00053                 if (shapeIndex>=0)
00054                 {
00055                         
00056 
00057                         b3Aabb localAabb = m_data->m_np->getLocalSpaceAabb(shapeIndex);
00058                         b3Aabb& worldAabb = m_data->m_aabbWorldSpace[i];
00059                         float margin=0.f;
00060                         b3TransformAabb2(localAabb.m_minVec,localAabb.m_maxVec,margin,position,orientation,&worldAabb.m_minVec,&worldAabb.m_maxVec);
00061                         m_data->m_bp->setAabb(i,worldAabb.m_minVec,worldAabb.m_maxVec,0);
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 }

00069         m_data->m_bp->calculateOverlappingPairs();
00070         numPairs = m_data->m_bp->getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs();
00071         printf("numPairs=%d\n",numPairs);
00072 }

00074 void b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::computeContactPoints()
00075 {
00076         
00077         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4>& pairs = m_data->m_bp->getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArray();
00078         
00079         m_data->m_np->computeContacts(pairs,m_data->m_aabbWorldSpace, m_data->m_rigidBodies);
00080 
00081 }
00082 void    b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::stepSimulation(float deltaTime)
00083 {
00084         
00085         //update world space aabb's
00086         updateAabbWorldSpace();
00087 
00088         //compute overlapping pairs
00089         computeOverlappingPairs();
00090 
00091         //compute contacts
00092         computeContactPoints();
00093 
00094         //solve contacts
00095         
00096         //update transforms
00097         integrate(deltaTime);
00098         
00099         
00100 }

00103 static  inline  float b3CalcRelVel(const b3Vector3& l0, const b3Vector3& l1, const b3Vector3& a0, const b3Vector3& a1, 
00104                                          const b3Vector3& linVel0, const b3Vector3& angVel0, const b3Vector3& linVel1, const b3Vector3& angVel1)
00105 {
00106         return b3Dot(l0, linVel0) + b3Dot(a0, angVel0) + b3Dot(l1, linVel1) + b3Dot(a1, angVel1);
00107 }

00109 
00110 static  inline  void b3SetLinearAndAngular(const b3Vector3& n, const b3Vector3& r0, const b3Vector3& r1,
00111                                                          b3Vector3& linear, b3Vector3& angular0, b3Vector3& angular1)
00112 {
00113         linear = -n;
00114         angular0 = -b3Cross(r0, n);
00115         angular1 = b3Cross(r1, n);
00116 }

00120 static inline void b3SolveContact(b3ContactConstraint4& cs, 
00121         const b3Vector3& posA, b3Vector3& linVelA, b3Vector3& angVelA, float invMassA, const b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaA,
00122         const b3Vector3& posB, b3Vector3& linVelB, b3Vector3& angVelB, float invMassB, const b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaB, 
00123         float maxRambdaDt[4], float minRambdaDt[4])
00124 {
00125 
00126         b3Vector3 dLinVelA; dLinVelA.setZero();
00127         b3Vector3 dAngVelA; dAngVelA.setZero();
00128         b3Vector3 dLinVelB; dLinVelB.setZero();
00129         b3Vector3 dAngVelB; dAngVelB.setZero();
00130 
00131         for(int ic=0; ic<4; ic++)
00132         {
00133                 //      dont necessary because this makes change to 0
00134                 if( cs.m_jacCoeffInv[ic] == 0.f ) continue;
00135 
00136                 {
00137                         b3Vector3 angular0, angular1, linear;
00138                         b3Vector3 r0 = cs.m_worldPos[ic] - (b3Vector3&)posA;
00139                         b3Vector3 r1 = cs.m_worldPos[ic] - (b3Vector3&)posB;
00140                         b3SetLinearAndAngular( (const b3Vector3 &)-cs.m_linear, (const b3Vector3 &)r0, (const b3Vector3 &)r1, linear, angular0, angular1 );
00141 
00142                         float rambdaDt = b3CalcRelVel((const b3Vector3 &)cs.m_linear,(const b3Vector3 &) -cs.m_linear, angular0, angular1,
00143                                 linVelA, angVelA, linVelB, angVelB ) + cs.m_b[ic];
00144                         rambdaDt *= cs.m_jacCoeffInv[ic];
00145 
00146                         {
00147                                 float prevSum = cs.m_appliedRambdaDt[ic];
00148                                 float updated = prevSum;
00149                                 updated += rambdaDt;
00150                                 updated = b3Max( updated, minRambdaDt[ic] );
00151                                 updated = b3Min( updated, maxRambdaDt[ic] );
00152                                 rambdaDt = updated - prevSum;
00153                                 cs.m_appliedRambdaDt[ic] = updated;
00154                         }
00155 
00156                         b3Vector3 linImp0 = invMassA*linear*rambdaDt;
00157                         b3Vector3 linImp1 = invMassB*(-linear)*rambdaDt;
00158                         b3Vector3 angImp0 = (invInertiaA* angular0)*rambdaDt;
00159                         b3Vector3 angImp1 = (invInertiaB* angular1)*rambdaDt;
00160 #ifdef _WIN32
00161             b3Assert(_finite(linImp0.getX()));
00162                         b3Assert(_finite(linImp1.getX()));
00163 #endif
00164                         {
00165                                 linVelA += linImp0;
00166                                 angVelA += angImp0;
00167                                 linVelB += linImp1;
00168                                 angVelB += angImp1;
00169                         }
00170                 }
00171         }
00172 
00173 
00174 }

00179 
00180 static inline void b3SolveFriction(b3ContactConstraint4& cs, 
00181                 const b3Vector3& posA, b3Vector3& linVelA, b3Vector3& angVelA, float invMassA, const b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaA,
00182                 const b3Vector3& posB, b3Vector3& linVelB, b3Vector3& angVelB, float invMassB, const b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaB, 
00183                 float maxRambdaDt[4], float minRambdaDt[4])
00184 {
00185 
00186         if( cs.m_fJacCoeffInv[0] == 0 && cs.m_fJacCoeffInv[0] == 0 ) return;
00187         const b3Vector3& center = (const b3Vector3&)cs.m_center;
00188 
00189         b3Vector3 n = -(const b3Vector3&)cs.m_linear;
00190 
00191         b3Vector3 tangent[2];
00192 
00193         b3PlaneSpace1 (n, tangent[0],tangent[1]);
00194 
00195         b3Vector3 angular0, angular1, linear;
00196         b3Vector3 r0 = center - posA;
00197         b3Vector3 r1 = center - posB;
00198         for(int i=0; i<2; i++)
00199         {
00200                 b3SetLinearAndAngular( tangent[i], r0, r1, linear, angular0, angular1 );
00201                 float rambdaDt = b3CalcRelVel(linear, -linear, angular0, angular1,
00202                         linVelA, angVelA, linVelB, angVelB );
00203                 rambdaDt *= cs.m_fJacCoeffInv[i];
00204 
00205                         {
00206                                 float prevSum = cs.m_fAppliedRambdaDt[i];
00207                                 float updated = prevSum;
00208                                 updated += rambdaDt;
00209                                 updated = b3Max( updated, minRambdaDt[i] );
00210                                 updated = b3Min( updated, maxRambdaDt[i] );
00211                                 rambdaDt = updated - prevSum;
00212                                 cs.m_fAppliedRambdaDt[i] = updated;
00213                         }
00214 
00215                 b3Vector3 linImp0 = invMassA*linear*rambdaDt;
00216                 b3Vector3 linImp1 = invMassB*(-linear)*rambdaDt;
00217                 b3Vector3 angImp0 = (invInertiaA* angular0)*rambdaDt;
00218                 b3Vector3 angImp1 = (invInertiaB* angular1)*rambdaDt;
00219 #ifdef _WIN32
00220                 b3Assert(_finite(linImp0.getX()));
00221                 b3Assert(_finite(linImp1.getX()));
00222 #endif
00223                 linVelA += linImp0;
00224                 angVelA += angImp0;
00225                 linVelB += linImp1;
00226                 angVelB += angImp1;
00227         }
00228 
00229         {       //      angular damping for point constraint
00230                 b3Vector3 ab = ( posB - posA ).normalized();
00231                 b3Vector3 ac = ( center - posA ).normalized();
00232                 if( b3Dot( ab, ac ) > 0.95f || (invMassA == 0.f || invMassB == 0.f))
00233                 {
00234                         float angNA = b3Dot( n, angVelA );
00235                         float angNB = b3Dot( n, angVelB );
00236 
00237                         angVelA -= (angNA*0.1f)*n;
00238                         angVelB -= (angNB*0.1f)*n;
00239                 }
00240         }
00241 
00242 }

00248 struct b3SolveTask// : public ThreadPool::Task
00249 {
00250         b3SolveTask(b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>& bodies,  
00251                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Inertia>& shapes, 
00252                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ContactConstraint4>& constraints,
00253                                 int start, int nConstraints,
00254                                 int maxNumBatches,
00255                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<int>* wgUsedBodies, int curWgidx
00256                                 )
00257                 : m_bodies( bodies ), m_shapes( shapes ), m_constraints( constraints ), 
00258                 m_wgUsedBodies(wgUsedBodies),m_curWgidx(curWgidx),
00259 m_start( start ), 
00260         m_nConstraints( nConstraints ),
00261         m_solveFriction( true ),
00262         m_maxNumBatches(maxNumBatches)
00263         {}
00264 
00265         unsigned short int getType(){ return 0; }
00266 
00267         void run(int tIdx)
00268         {
00269                 b3AlignedObjectArray<int> usedBodies;
00270                 //printf("run..............\n");
00271 
00272                 
00273                 for (int bb=0;bb<m_maxNumBatches;bb++)
00274                 {
00275                         usedBodies.resize(0);
00276                         for(int ic=m_nConstraints-1; ic>=0; ic--)
00277                         //for(int ic=0; ic<m_nConstraints; ic++)
00278                         {
00279                                 
00280                                 int i = m_start + ic;
00281                                 if (m_constraints[i].m_batchIdx != bb)
00282                                         continue;
00283 
00284                                 float frictionCoeff = b3GetFrictionCoeff(&m_constraints[i]);
00285                                 int aIdx = (int)m_constraints[i].m_bodyA;
00286                                 int bIdx = (int)m_constraints[i].m_bodyB;
00287                                 //int localBatch = m_constraints[i].m_batchIdx;
00288                                 b3RigidBodyData& bodyA = m_bodies[aIdx];
00289                                 b3RigidBodyData& bodyB = m_bodies[bIdx];
00290 
00291 #if 0
00292                                 if ((bodyA.m_invMass) && (bodyB.m_invMass))
00293                                 {
00294                                 //      printf("aIdx=%d, bIdx=%d\n", aIdx,bIdx);
00295                                 }
00296                                 if (bIdx==10)
00297                                 {
00298                                         //printf("ic(b)=%d, localBatch=%d\n",ic,localBatch);
00299                                 }
00300 #endif
00301                                 if (aIdx==10)
00302                                 {
00303                                         //printf("ic(a)=%d, localBatch=%d\n",ic,localBatch);
00304                                 }
00305                                 if (usedBodies.size()<(aIdx+1))
00306                                 {
00307                                         usedBodies.resize(aIdx+1,0);
00308                                 }
00309                 
00310                                 if (usedBodies.size()<(bIdx+1))
00311                                 {
00312                                         usedBodies.resize(bIdx+1,0);
00313                                 }
00314 
00315                                 if (bodyA.m_invMass)
00316                                 {
00317                                         b3Assert(usedBodies[aIdx]==0);
00318                                         usedBodies[aIdx]++;
00319                                 }
00320                                 
00321                                 if (bodyB.m_invMass)
00322                                 {
00323                                         b3Assert(usedBodies[bIdx]==0);
00324                                         usedBodies[bIdx]++;
00325                                 }
00326                                 
00327 
00328                                 if( !m_solveFriction )
00329                                 {
00330                                         float maxRambdaDt[4] = {FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX};
00331                                         float minRambdaDt[4] = {0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f};
00332 
00333                                         b3SolveContact( m_constraints[i], (b3Vector3&)bodyA.m_pos, (b3Vector3&)bodyA.m_linVel, (b3Vector3&)bodyA.m_angVel, bodyA.m_invMass, (const b3Matrix3x3 &)m_shapes[aIdx].m_invInertiaWorld, 
00334                                                         (b3Vector3&)bodyB.m_pos, (b3Vector3&)bodyB.m_linVel, (b3Vector3&)bodyB.m_angVel, bodyB.m_invMass, (const b3Matrix3x3 &)m_shapes[bIdx].m_invInertiaWorld,
00335                                                 maxRambdaDt, minRambdaDt );
00336 
00337                                 }
00338                                 else
00339                                 {
00340                                         float maxRambdaDt[4] = {FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX};
00341                                         float minRambdaDt[4] = {0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f};
00342 
00343                                         float sum = 0;
00344                                         for(int j=0; j<4; j++)
00345                                         {
00346                                                 sum +=m_constraints[i].m_appliedRambdaDt[j];
00347                                         }
00348                                         frictionCoeff = 0.7f;
00349                                         for(int j=0; j<4; j++)
00350                                         {
00351                                                 maxRambdaDt[j] = frictionCoeff*sum;
00352                                                 minRambdaDt[j] = -maxRambdaDt[j];
00353                                         }
00354 
00355                                 b3SolveFriction( m_constraints[i], (b3Vector3&)bodyA.m_pos, (b3Vector3&)bodyA.m_linVel, (b3Vector3&)bodyA.m_angVel, bodyA.m_invMass,(const b3Matrix3x3 &) m_shapes[aIdx].m_invInertiaWorld, 
00356                                                 (b3Vector3&)bodyB.m_pos, (b3Vector3&)bodyB.m_linVel, (b3Vector3&)bodyB.m_angVel, bodyB.m_invMass,(const b3Matrix3x3 &) m_shapes[bIdx].m_invInertiaWorld,
00357                                                 maxRambdaDt, minRambdaDt );
00358                         
00359                                 }
00360                         }
00361 
00362                         if (m_wgUsedBodies)
00363                         {
00364                                 if (m_wgUsedBodies[m_curWgidx].size()<usedBodies.size())
00365                                 {
00366                                         m_wgUsedBodies[m_curWgidx].resize(usedBodies.size());
00367                                 }
00368                                 for (int i=0;i<usedBodies.size();i++)
00369                                 {
00370                                         if (usedBodies[i])
00371                                         {
00372                                                 //printf("cell %d uses body %d\n", m_curWgidx,i);
00373                                                 m_wgUsedBodies[m_curWgidx][i]=1;
00374                                         }
00375                                 }
00376                         }
00377 
00378                 }
00379 
00380 
00381                 
00382         }
00383 
00384         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>& m_bodies;
00385         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Inertia>& m_shapes;
00386         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ContactConstraint4>& m_constraints;
00387         b3AlignedObjectArray<int>* m_wgUsedBodies;
00388         int m_curWgidx;
00389         int m_start;
00390         int m_nConstraints;
00391         bool m_solveFriction;
00392         int m_maxNumBatches;
00393 };
00394 
00395 void b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::solveContactConstraints()
00396 {
00397         int m_nIterations = 4;
00398 
00399         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ContactConstraint4> contactConstraints;
00400 //      const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4Data>& contacts = m_data->m_np->getContacts();
00401         int n = contactConstraints.size();
00402         //convert contacts...
00403 
00404 
00405         
00406         int maxNumBatches = 250;
00407 
00408         for(int iter=0; iter<m_nIterations; iter++)
00409         {
00410                 b3SolveTask task( m_data->m_rigidBodies, m_data->m_inertias, contactConstraints, 0, n ,maxNumBatches,0,0);
00411                 task.m_solveFriction = false;
00412                 task.run(0);
00413         }
00414 
00415         for(int iter=0; iter<m_nIterations; iter++)
00416         {
00417                 b3SolveTask task( m_data->m_rigidBodies, m_data->m_inertias, contactConstraints, 0, n ,maxNumBatches,0,0);
00418                 task.m_solveFriction = true;
00419                 task.run(0);
00420         }
00421 }
00422 
00423 void b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::integrate(float deltaTime)
00424 {
00425         float angDamping=0.f;
00426         b3Vector3 gravityAcceleration=b3MakeVector3(0,-9,0);
00427 
00428         //integrate transforms (external forces/gravity should be moved into constraint solver)
00429         for (int i=0;i<m_data->m_rigidBodies.size();i++)
00430         {
00431                 b3IntegrateTransform(&m_data->m_rigidBodies[i],deltaTime,angDamping,gravityAcceleration);
00432         }
00433 
00434 }
00435 
00436 int             b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::registerPhysicsInstance(float mass, const float* position, const float* orientation, int collidableIndex, int userData)
00437 {
00438         b3RigidBodyData body;
00439         int bodyIndex = m_data->m_rigidBodies.size();
00440         body.m_invMass = mass ? 1.f/mass : 0.f;
00441         body.m_angVel.setValue(0,0,0);
00442         body.m_collidableIdx = collidableIndex;
00443         body.m_frictionCoeff = 0.3f;
00444         body.m_linVel.setValue(0,0,0);
00445         body.m_pos.setValue(position[0],position[1],position[2]);
00446         body.m_quat.setValue(orientation[0],orientation[1],orientation[2],orientation[3]);
00447         body.m_restituitionCoeff = 0.f;
00448 
00449         m_data->m_rigidBodies.push_back(body);
00450 
00451         
00452         if (collidableIndex>=0)
00453         {
00454                 b3Aabb& worldAabb = m_data->m_aabbWorldSpace.expand();
00455 
00456                 b3Aabb localAabb = m_data->m_np->getLocalSpaceAabb(collidableIndex);
00457                 b3Vector3 localAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(localAabb.m_min[0],localAabb.m_min[1],localAabb.m_min[2]);
00458                 b3Vector3 localAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(localAabb.m_max[0],localAabb.m_max[1],localAabb.m_max[2]);
00459                 
00460                 b3Scalar margin = 0.01f;
00461                 b3Transform t;
00462                 t.setIdentity();
00463                 t.setOrigin(b3MakeVector3(position[0],position[1],position[2]));
00464                 t.setRotation(b3Quaternion(orientation[0],orientation[1],orientation[2],orientation[3]));
00465                 b3TransformAabb(localAabbMin,localAabbMax, margin,t,worldAabb.m_minVec,worldAabb.m_maxVec);
00466 
00467                 m_data->m_bp->createProxy(worldAabb.m_minVec,worldAabb.m_maxVec,bodyIndex,0,1,1);
00468 //              b3Vector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00469         //      m_data->m_bp->getAabb(bodyIndex,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00470 
00471         } else
00472         {
00473                 b3Error("registerPhysicsInstance using invalid collidableIndex\n");
00474         }
00475 
00476         return bodyIndex;
00477 }

00480 const struct b3RigidBodyData* b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::getBodyBuffer() const
00481 {
00482         return m_data->m_rigidBodies.size() ? &m_data->m_rigidBodies[0] : 0;
00483 }

00485 int     b3CpuRigidBodyPipeline::getNumBodies() const
